00030 namespace Hypertable {
00031 
00032 String format(const char *fmt, ...) {
00033   char buf[1024];       // should be enough for most cases
00034   int n, size = sizeof(buf);
00035   char *p = buf;
00036   va_list ap;
00037 
00038   do {
00039     va_start(ap, fmt);
00040     n = vsnprintf(p, size, fmt, ap);
00041     va_end(ap);
00042 
00043     if (n > -1 && n < size)
00044       break;    // worked!
00045 
00046     if (n > -1)         // glibc 2.1+/iso c99
00047       size = n + 1;     //   exactly what's needed
00048     else                // glibc 2.0
00049       size *= 2;        //   double the size and try again
00050 
00051     p = (char *)(p == buf ? malloc(size) : realloc(p, size));
00052 
00053     if (!p)
00054       throw bad_alloc();
00055   } while (true);
00056 
00057   if (buf == p)
00058     return string(p, n);
00059 
00060   string ret(p, n);
00061   free(p);
00062 
00063   return ret;
00064 }
00065 
00066 char const *const digits = "0123456789";
00067 
00068 String format_number(int64_t n, int sep) {
00069   char buf[30], *p = buf, *p0 = buf;
00070   int ndigits = 0;
00071   uint64_t num; // for edge cases when -n is still negative when n < 0
00072 
00073   if (n < 0) {
00074     *p++ = '-';
00075     p0 = p;
00076     num = -n;
00077   }
00078   else
00079     num = n;
00080 
00081   if (num == 0)
00082     *p++ = '0';
00083   else for (; num != 0; num /= 10) {
00084     *p++ = digits[num % 10];
00085     ++ndigits;
00086 
00087     if (num >= 10 && ndigits % 3 == 0)
00088       *p++ = sep;
00089   }
00090 
00091   int len = ndigits + (ndigits - 1) / 3;
00092   std::reverse(p0, p0 + len);
00093 
00094   return String(buf, len + p0 - buf);
00095 }

00097 String
00098 format_bytes(size_t n, const void *buf, size_t len, const char *trailer) {
00099   if (buf) {
00100     if (len <= n)
00101       return String((char *)buf, len);
00102 
00103     String out((char *)buf, n);
00104     out += trailer;
00105     return out;
00106   }
00107   return "<null>";
00108 }
